text: Several places including Dodamgoda, Panadura, Welipanne, and Godagama interchanges of the Southern Expressway have been inundated due to the floods.Drivers are requested to contact hotline 1969 and make inquiries before using the Southern Expressway. Several places including Dodamgoda, Panadura, Welipanne, and Godagama interchanges of the Southern Expressway have been inundated due to the floods.
title: Southern Expressway inundated: Call 1969 for inquiries
